PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Highway 385: location where Agents Graham and Snodgrass were parked
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.United States/Mexican border: border near which vehicle sensors were located
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Big Bend National Park: area where vehicle sensors detected northbound vehicles
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Marfa Sector: sector whose Communications notified the agents
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.United States: country sharing a border with Mexico
